item.title: Pring Req Help
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

If you want the message, then you can do this:

if (wearID == 773) {
     if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("pblord7"))
          return true;
     else {
          sM("Only Pblord7 can use a Perfect Ring.");
          return false;
     }

OR

if (wearID == 773) {
     if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("pblord7")) {
          return true;
     } else {
          sM("Only Pblord7 can use a Perfect Ring.");
          return false;
     }

Doesn’t really make a difference.

Read full topic

item.title: Pring Req Help
item.dc:creator: @CarScape CarScape
item.description:
@CarScape wrote:

[quote=“EmulousGuru, post:6, topic:364803”]Then try this:

if (wearID == 773) if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("pblord7")) return true; else return false; [/quote]

Should be like this?

if (wearID == 773) {
     if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("pblord7")) {
          return true;
     } else {
          sM("Only Pblord7 can use a Perfect Ring.");
          return false;
     }

And if theres no aother item after it
like else if, add last bracket

Read full topic

item.title: Pring Req Help
item.dc:creator: @Pblord7 Pblord7
item.description:
@Pblord7 wrote:

[quote=“EmulousGuru, post:4, topic:364803”]Yes, I will break it down for you.

if (wearID == 773)
        return playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("pblord7") ? true : false;

The return is returning your name, and the ? is checking if it is true or false.
If it is your name, it will return true, so you will be able to use it.
If it is not your name, it will return false, and you cannot wield it.[/quote]

It didnt work for me >.>

Read full topic

item.title: Pring Req Help
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

Yes, I will break it down for you.

if (wearID == 773)
        return playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("pblord7") ? true : false;

The return is returning your name, and the ? is checking if it is true or false.
If it is your name, it will return true, so you will be able to use it.
If it is not your name, it will return false, and you cannot wield it.

Read full topic

item.title: Pring Req Help
item.dc:creator: @Pblord7 Pblord7
item.description:
@Pblord7 wrote:

Heres my code:

if(wearID == 773  && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("pblord7"))){
sM("Only Pblord7 can use a Perfect Ring.");
return false;
}

Read full topic
